creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: White cotton background; supplementary weft patterns of arrows, dots, chevron, net in purple, pink, black, magenta, blue and green; four selvedge ends; velvet ribbon applied to neckline and armholes.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
